form.IN:
Obliki za preteklik in pretekli deležnik sta lahko
forecasted
ali
forecast
.

sense.def:
A forecast
je predvidevanje prihodnjih stvari ali dogodkov.

seg.quote: ...forecasts of military involvement in British politics.

sense.def:
Kdor
forecasts future events
, poveda, kaj misli, da se bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: Some warm weather had been forecast.
